The Convergences Forum was held on November 6 at Bogota around the transition towards sustainable cities and territories and the implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals in Colombia!

Elaborated in collaboration with a multiactor colombian Working Group conulted in Bogota, the 1st edition of the Convergences Colombia Forum was a space of dialogue and a platform to share good practices, in order to jointly succeed in the colombian transition towards sustainable cities and territories and work toward a 3Zero Colombia (Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty) ! The Convergences Colombia Forum – Juntos para la transición hacia territorios y comunidades sostenibles allowed:

  • Sharing experiences to initate a cartography of initiatives that contribute to a 3Zero Colombia
  • Exchanges on the role and place of each in the 2030 Agenda
  • The discovery of financial mechanisme for the SDGs in Colombia

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” module_alignment=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

¡El 7 de noviembre tuvo lugar una Expedición de aprendizaje para encontrar a los que hacen de Bogotá una ciudad sostenible e incluyente !

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” module_alignment=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

On November 7th, took place a 3Zeros City Tour to meet those who make Bogota a sustainable and inclusive city!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/Programa-del-Expedición-3CEROS.png” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” sticky=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”]
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“El siglo XIX fue el siglo de los imperios, el siglo XX el de los Estados nacionales. El siglo XXI será el siglo de las ciudades”. Colombia se ha transformado en los últimos veinte años gracias a una política urbana ambiciosa que mezcla inclusión social e innovaciones tecnológicas. Eco-distrito, corto-circuitos, ciudad jardín, ciudad conectada son conceptos que se han hecho realidad en los espacios abiertos de innovación que abundan en Colombia.

¿La cuna de este renacimiento? La vertiginosa Bogotá, que se ha convertido en un ejemplo de ciudad Inteligente y sostenible. Bogotá recibió los City Climate Leadership Awards por parte del C40 Cities y es un lugar de inspiración y aprendizaje para los líderes de hoy que están creando la ciudad del mañana.

DAR LA VULTA A LOS HÉROES 3CERO DE BOGOTÁ

Impact Hub Bogotá y Convergencias organizó una jornada interactiva privilegiada en inmersión para entender y experimentar la ciudad con la nueva mirada de líderes 3Ceros de Bogotá. Este día permitió el encuentro  de los héroes que innovan para la ciudad. ¿Cómo hacen frente a los crecientes desafíos y cómo puede usted inspirarse y convertirse, a su vez, en un héroe 3Ceros?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“The 19th century was the century of empires, the 20th century the century of nation states. The 21st century will be the century of cities”. Colombia changed over the last twenty years thanks to an ambitious urban policy mixing social inclusion and technological innovations. Eco-district, short-circuits, garden city, connected city… as many projects to be found in the open spaces of innovation that abound in the country.

The cradle of this renaissance? The dizzying Bogota, which in less than twenty years has become an example of smart and sustainable city. Bogota received the Climate Leadership in Cities Awards in 2014 by Siemens and C40 Cities and is now a place of inspiration for leaders seeking to create the city of tomorrow.

MEET THE 3ZERO HEROS OF BOGOTA

Impact Hub Bogotá and Convergences organised an interactive onsite day to visit Bogotá from the 3Zeros leaders’ urban innovation perspective. This day allowed the meeting on the field of the heroes who innovate for the city during a one-day journey of immersion. How do they face the growing challenges and how can you be inspired to become a 3Zero Hero?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider color=”#bcbcbc” divider_weight=”3″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.16″ hide_on_mobile=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”]
[/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” module_alignment=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Evaluación del Foro de Convergencias Colombia / Assessment of the Convergences Forum Colombia

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Inspirar & Comprometerse: El 79% de los participantes ahora quieren comprometerse más, personalmente o profesionalmente con un mundo 3Cero.

Herramientas de trabajo: Tras el Foro, el 85% tiene una mejor comprensión de los temas de desarrollo sostenible, de los ODS y del sector. El 74% ha adquirido herramientas concretas útiles para su actividad profesional.

Diálogo & Co-construcción: Para el 66% de los participantes, el Foro permitió reunirse con actores complementarios que podrían conducir a proyectos concretos.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Inspire & getting involved: 79% of the attendees now want to engage more personally or professionally for a 3Zero World

Acquire working tools: Thanks to the Forum, 85% of them have a better understanding of what is at stake and of the sector & 74% have acquired concrete and useful tools

Exchange & co-create: For 66% of the attendees, the Forum allowed the meeting of complementary actors which can lead to concrete projects

excerpt.rendered: Colombia Convergences Forum  Transition towards sustainable territories and communities The Convergences Forum was held on November 6 at Bogota around the transition towards sustainable cities and territories and the implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals in Colombia! Elaborated in collaboration with a multiactor colombian Working Group conulted in Bogota, the 1st edition of the Convergences […]
